Subject: World Building for RPGs and Fiction
Description: An interactive seminar with published authors and game designers going through an actual world creation process that will be distributed to participants for their own use.  Speakers include:Andrew M. "Fish" Popowich, Warren Brown - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: The GRAM Role-Playing Game: Introductory Demo
Description: RPG; Join us for a demonstration of the GRAM role playing game led by one of the game designers.  Speakers include:Warren Brown - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: GMing 101: Stepping Behind the Screen
Description: An intro for players who want to start gamemastering and helpful tips from veterans for those just starting out (or needing a refresher).  Speakers include:Andrew M. "Fish" Popowich, Erika Wagner, Warren Brown - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 1 hour
